belongs_to_collection.name: Kenny Rogers Legend Of The Gambler Collection

original_title: The Gambler, Part III: The Legend Continues
overview: Brady Hawkes and Billy Montana join forces once again in this new adventure. This time around their goal is to help the Sioux fight the government and get the supplies they need. They also uncover corruption within a government outpost and find themselves in a dangerous position.
title: The Gambler, Part III: The Legend Continues
